#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
main()
{
 int t;cin>>t;
 while(t!=0)
 {
   t--;
   char c[1000];
   cin>>c;
   int n=strlen(c),s,i;
  for(i=0;i<n;)
  {
     int x=c[i];x=x-48;
     if(x>=6&&x<=9)
     {
        s=x;
        x=c[i+1];x=x-48;
        s=s*10+x;
       char f=s;
         cout<<f;i+=2;
     }
      else if(x==1)
      {
        s=x;
        x=c[i+1];x=x-48;
        s=s*10+x;
        x=c[i+2];x=x-48;
        s=s*10+x;
        char f=s;cout<<f;i+=3;
      }
      else if(x==3)
      {
          s=x;
           x=c[i+1];x=x-48;
          s=s*10+x;
          char f=s;cout<<f;i+=2;
       }
       else;
    }
    cout<<endl;
}
 }
